self.description: Built-in variable self that is a reference to the widget instance

onInit.description:
The first function which is called when widget is ready for initialization.
Should be used to prepare widget DOM, process widget settings and initial subscription information.

onDataUpdated.description:
Called when the new data is available from the widget subscription.
Latest data can be accessed from the defaultSubscription property of widget context (ctx).

onResize.description: Called when widget container is resized. Latest width and height can be obtained from widget context (ctx).

onEditModeChanged.description: Called when dashboard editing mode is changed. Latest mode is handled by isEdit property of widget context (ctx).

onMobileModeChanged.description: Called when dashboard view width crosses mobile breakpoint. Latest state is handled by isMobile property of widget context (ctx).

onDestroy.description: Called when widget element is destroyed. Should be used to cleanup all resources if necessary.

getSettingsForm.description: Optional function returning widget settings form array as alternative to Settings form tab of settings section.

return.description: An array of widget settings form properties

getDataKeySettingsForm.description: Optional function returning particular data key settings form array as alternative to Data key settings form tab of settings section.

return.description: An array of data key settings form properties
A particular data key settings schema json

typeParameters.description: Returns object describing widget datasource parameters.

return.description: An object describing widget datasource parameters.

actionSources.description: Returns map describing available widget action sources used to define user actions.

return.description: A map of action sources by action source id.

ctx.description:
A reference to widget context that has all necessary API
and data used by widget instance.

$container.description:
Container element of the widget.
Can be used to dynamically access or modify widget DOM using jQuery API.

$scope.description:
Reference to the current widget component.
Can be used to access/modify component properties when widget is built using Angular approach.

width.description: Current width of widget container in pixels.

height.description: Current height of widget container in pixels.

isEdit.description: Indicates whether the dashboard is in in the view or editing state.

isMobile.description: Indicates whether the dashboard view is less then 960px width (default mobile breakpoint).

widgetConfig.description: Common widget configuration containing properties such as color (text color), backgroundColor (widget background color), etc.

showTitleIcon.description: Whether to show widget title icon.

enableFullscreen.description: Whether to enable fullscreen button on widget.

useDashboardTimewindow.description: Whether to use dashboard timewindow (applicable for timeseries widgets).

displayTimewindow.description: Whether to display timewindow (applicable for timeseries widgets).

showMin.description: Whether to display aggregated min values.

showMax.description: Whether to display aggregated max values.

showAvg.description: Whether to display aggregated average values.

showTotal.description: Whether to display aggregated total values.

hideInterval.description: Whether to hide interval selection in timewindow panel.

hideAggregation.description: Whether to hide aggregation selection in timewindow panel.

hideAggInterval.description: Whether to hide aggregation interval selection in timewindow panel.

selectedTab.description: Current selected timewindow type (0 - realtime, 1 - history).

historyType.description: History timewindow type (0 - last interval, 1 - fixed)

startTimeMs.description: Timewindow start time in UTC milliseconds

endTimeMs.description: Timewindow end time in UTC milliseconds

limit.description: Maximum allowed datapoints when aggregation is disabled (AggregationType == 'NONE')

units.description: Optional property defining units text of values displayed by widget. Useful for simple widgets like cards or gauges.

decimals.description: Optional property defining how many positions should be used to display decimal part of the value number.

settings.description: Widget settings containing widget specific properties according to the defined settings form.

alarmSource.description: Configured alarm source for alarm widget type.

alarmSearchStatus.description: Configured default alarm search status for alarm widget type.

alarmsPollingInterval.description: Configured alarms polling interval for alarm widget type.

alarmsMaxCountLoad.description: Configured maximum alarms to load for alarm widget type.

alarmsFetchSize.description: Configured alarms page size used to load alarms.

settings.description: Widget settings containing widget specific properties according to the defined settings form.

timeWindow.description: Current widget timewindow (applicable for timeseries widgets).

units.description: Optional property defining units text of values displayed by widget. Useful for simple widgets like cards or gauges.

decimals.description: Optional property defining how many positions should be used to display decimal part of the value number.

customerId.description: Customer id of the user (available when user belongs to specific customer).

authority.description: User authority. Possible values: SYS_ADMIN, TENANT_ADMIN, CUSTOMER_USER

hideTitlePanel.description: Manages visibility of widget title panel. Useful for widget with custom title panels or different states. updateWidgetParams() function must be called after this property change.

widgetTitle.description: If set, will override configured widget title text. updateWidgetParams() function must be called after this property change.

detectChanges.description: Trigger change detection for current widget. Must be invoked when widget HTML template bindings should be updated due to widget data changes.

updateWidgetParams.description: Updates widget with runtime set properties such as widgetTitle, hideTitlePanel, etc. Must be invoked in order these properties changes take effect.

defaultSubscription.description:
Default widget subscription object contains all subscription information,
including current data, according to the widget type.

timewindowFunctions.description: Object with timewindow functions used to manage widget data time frame. Can by used by Time-series or Alarm widgets.

onUpdateTimewindow.description:
This function can be used to update current subscription time frame
to historical one identified by startTimeMs and endTimeMs arguments.

args.name: startTimeMs
args.description: Timewindow start time in UTC milliseconds

args.name: endTimeMs
args.description: Timewindow end time in UTC milliseconds

onResetTimewindow.description:
Resets subscription time frame to default defined by widget timewindow component
or dashboard timewindow depending on widget settings.

controlApi.description: Object that provides API functions for RPC (Control) widgets.

sendOneWayCommand.description: Sends one way (without response) RPC command to the device.

args.name: params
args.description: RPC method params, custom json object

args.name: timeout
args.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds to wait until response/acknowledgement is received.

args.name: persistentPollingInterval
args.description: Polling interval in milliseconds to get persistent RPC command response

sendTwoWayCommand.description: Sends two way (with response) RPC command to the device.

args.name: params
args.description: RPC method params, custom json object

args.name: timeout
args.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds to wait until response/acknowledgement is received.

args.name: persistentPollingInterval
args.description: Polling interval in milliseconds to get persistent RPC command response

return.description: A command execution Observable of response body.

actionsApi.description: Set of API functions to work with user defined actions.

getActionDescriptors.description: Get list of action descriptors for provided actionSourceId.

handleWidgetAction.description: Handle action produced by particular action source.

args.name: $event
args.description: DOM event object associated with action.

args.name: entityId
args.description: Current entity id provided by action source if available.

args.name: entityName
args.description: Current entity name provided by action source if available.

stateController.description: Reference to Dashboard state controller, providing API to manage current dashboard state.

args.name: id
args.description: An id of the target dashboard state.

args.name: params
args.description: An object with state parameters to use by the new state.

args.name: openRightLayout
args.description: An optional boolean argument to force open right dashboard layout if present in mobile view mode.

pushAndOpenState.description: Navigate to new dashboard state and adding intermediate states.

args.name: id
args.description: An array state object of the target dashboard state.

args.name: openRightLayout
args.description: An optional boolean argument to force open right dashboard layout if present in mobile view mode.

args.name: id
args.description: An optional id of the target dashboard state to replace current state id.

args.name: params
args.description: An object with state parameters to update current state parameters.

args.name: openRightLayout
args.description: An optional boolean argument to force open right dashboard layout if present in mobile view mode.

getStateParamsByStateId.description: Get state parameters for particular dashboard state identified by id.

args.name: id
args.description: An id of the target dashboard state.

args.description: Request body to be sent to device
